name: locations
description: Information on locations. Each resource (desk, room, etc.) is technically a location

columns.name: id
columns.description: The internal ID of the location

columns.name: organisation_id
columns.description: The ID of the host organisation. This is only applicable to customers using cross-organisation resource sharing.

columns.name: organisation_name
columns.description: The name of the host organisation. This is only applicable to customers using cross-organisation resource sharing.

columns.name: parent_id
columns.description: The internal ID of the parent location (hierarchy of locations)

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The type of location (e.g. building, floor, zone, desk)

columns.name: capacity
columns.description: Capacity of location

columns.name: minimum_capacity
columns.description: Not included in API docs: Minimum capacity of location

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the location or resource

columns.name: short_qualifier
columns.description: Short text that can be used to distinguish between two locations or resources with the same name. For example, two buildings might both have a meeting room called Room 101. The short qualifier is usually the name of the building.

columns.name: long_qualifier
columns.description: A longer text that can be used to distinguish between two locations/resources with the same name. For example, two floors might both have a desk bank called Desk Bank A. The long qualifier might be the name of the floor and building separated by a comma.

columns.name: qualified_name
columns.description: Combination of information from name, short_qualifier and long_qualifier

columns.name: long_name
columns.description: Long text - more information on name of resource

columns.name: short_name
columns.description: Short text - more information on name of resource

columns.name: description
columns.description: Not included in API docs: Description of resource on system

columns.name: alert
columns.description: Text information alerted to user

columns.name: is_bookable
columns.description: True for a location that is a bookable resource. Such locations will also have a booking category id.

columns.name: is_flex
columns.description: Not included in API docs: True if space is a flexible space

columns.name: external_reference
columns.description: Not included in API docs

columns.name: booking_category_id
columns.description: The id of the corresponding booking category for a bookable resource, such as a desk or meeting room

columns.name: availability_type
columns.description: Not included in API docs

columns.name: settings_time_zone_id
columns.description: Not included in API docs

columns.name: provider_id
columns.description: Not included in API docs

columns.name: provider_notificaftion_days_interval
columns.description: Not included in API docs

columns.name: left
columns.description: The location or resource's left value as described in the Location hierarchy section (see API documentation)

columns.name: right
columns.description: The location or resource's right value as described in the Location hierarchy section (see API documentation)
